name: 7DS CC Calculator
description:
-------------------------------- GAME INFO --------------------------------

With CC Calculator you can calculate the CC of your 7DS: Grand Cross team with:

> Lv 90, 5 Stars Super Awakened

> Max Equipment (UR Gears, Maxed Stats & Maxed %)

> Full Maxed UR Costumes (5 UR Outfits, 5 UR Weapons, 5 UR Cosmetics)

> 4 Million CC account HP Multiplier

You will be able to set the main heroes and their respective links, also you can open the equipment menu to set each hero (and link) with maxed equipment gears.

-------------------------------- Thanks for playing --------------------------------

If you like the CC Calculator you can follow me on Twitter, Reddit or even Donate :)

Twitter - Reddit community - Donations :)
